title: br: ebs restore could not success when network down more than 5 seconds
body:
## Bug Report


### What version of TiKV are you using?
docker image
pingcap/tikv:nightly

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
centos

### Steps to reproduce
1. create cluster with 80+ tikv nodes
2. following the instruction https://docs.pingcap.com/zh/tidb-in-kubernetes/v1.4/backup-to-aws-s3-by-snapshot to create a cluster backup
3. create backup
4. following https://docs.pingcap.com/zh/tidb-in-kubernetes/v1.4/restore-from-aws-s3-by-snapshot to restore the cluster
restore does not success

### What did you expect?
restore success

### What did happened?
restore stuck
